CutSceneText.Text: These Tursin Krall actually dare to attack Tijerid head on...
You have returned, [%username]. So, how did the investigation go?
I barely managed to kill Chieftain [Duaguru], but...
As he was dying, he revealed that [Shandu] is plotting something... And that it's already too late...
Muahaha... Can't you see all these bodies of the dead Krall here? They came from the front and were completely massacred.
And they were also making an unknown poison in the Duaguru village...
Come to think of it, those Krall we fought this time seemed to have spread poison on their weapons.
But that's about all Krall can do, anyway...
Anyway, you have done well! Now all that's left is return and have a nice drink to celebrate our success. Muhaha!
